thread.title: ‘Namami Brahmaputra’ fest: Europe, USA no longer vital markets for India, SE Asia emerging destination, says President Pranab Mukherjee
thread.title_full: ‘Namami Brahmaputra’ fest: Europe, USA no longer vital markets for India, SE Asia emerging destination, says President Pranab Mukherjee

author: FE Online
title: ‘Namami Brahmaputra’ fest: Europe, USA no longer vital markets for India, SE Asia emerging destination, says President Pranab Mukherjee
text:
India news ‘Namami Brahmaputra’ fest: Europe, USA no longer vital markets for India, SE Asia emerging destination, says President Pranab Mukherjee ‘Namami Brahmaputra’ fest: Europe, USA no longer vital markets for India, SE Asia emerging destination, says President Pranab Mukherjee President Pranab Mukherjee while inaugurating the ‘Namami Brahmaputra (Obeisance to Brahmaputra) festival’ today addressed the people in Guwahati. By: FE Online | New Delhi | Published: March 31, 2017 5:18 PM President Pranab Mukherjee. (ANI) 
President Pranab Mukherjee while inaugurating the ‘Namami Brahmaputra (Obeisance to Brahmaputra) festival’ today addressed the people in Guwahati. In his speech, President Mukherjee urged Sarbananda Sonowal, the Chief Minister of Assam to make the Namami Brahmaputra a regular programme. He said, “I would like to suggest to the CM (Assam) & his cabinet colleagues to make it a regular programme.” He also talked about Indian Investment outside the country and said, “Europe and USA no longer vital markets for India, South East Asian countries emerging destination of Indian Investment.”
